structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Authority to enact orders, rules and regulations for reduction of air pollution.
law.text: Whenever the air pollution control board finds that the air in the air pollution control district is so polluted as to cause any discomfort or property damage at intervals to a substantial number of inhabitants of the district, the air pollution control board may make and enforce such orders, rules, and regulations as will reduce the amount of air contaminants released within the district.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 46, effective March 14, 1952.
